longBusinessSummary: United Arrows Ltd. engages in the planning, buying, and sale of men's and women's clothing and accessories, and miscellaneous items in Japan. It operates multi-brand shops under the UNITED ARROWS, District UNITED ARROWS, UNITED ARROWS Golf, EMMEL REFINES, LOEFF, AEWEN MATOPH, BLAMINK, monkey time, BEAUTY&YOUTH UNITED ARROWS, 6, H BEAUTY&YOUTH, STEVEN ALAN, UNITED ARROWS green label relaxing, Odette e Odile, DRAWER, ASTRAET, UNITED ARROWS LTD.OUTLET, California General Store, UNITED ARROWS & SONS, Lepidos, SOVEREIGN UNITED ARROWS, Pheeta, koti, PREEK, MARW UNITED ARROWS, JUICE, TO UNITED ARROWS, and CITEN brands, as well as online store under the UNITED ARROWS ONLINE brand name. The company also sells its products under the coen and CHROME HEARTS brands. United Arrows Ltd. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
